比率。割合。「三日に一回の＿で通う」: １ 人の行動・性質や事物の状態などが水準より劣っているさま。２ 人の行動・性質や事物の状態が、正邪・当否の判断基準に達していないさま。

per; out of; proportion: parting, separation, farewell, (lateral) branch, fork, offshoot, division, section
branch off, diverge from, fork, split, dispense, scatter, divide into
boil, grow hot, get excited, gush forth
expressly, specially, doing something especially rather than incidentally
only, merely, a little, small quantity
rate, ratio, proportion, comparatively, contrary to expectations
to cut in, to thrust oneself into, to wedge oneself in, to muscle in on, to interrupt, to disturb
divide, cut, break, halve, separate, split, rip, crack, smash, dilute
